about_the_game:
Dungeon Board is a virtual tabletop and companion app that puts you in control. Author your encounters and play them out with friends!

Now with built-in multiplayer via Steam, or screen share with your friends!

Tokens

Create tokens to represent your characters, important objects, or anything you need! With a fully featured array of customisations, you can:
  • Import custom images, or use our built-in options.
  • Save and load your token creations, to bring out your fine-tuned monsters at a moment's notice!
  • Rename and describe your tokens to build an immersive world.
  • Recolour each token. Represent factions, classes, or just make them pretty!
  • Multiple token shapes allow even further distinctions between tokens.
  • Resize every character, whether a minuscule gnome or a lumbering orc, token sizes allow your characters to be accurately portrayed.
  • Copy and paste speeds up your encounters! Your player won't stop making illusory copies of themself? No worries!
    and even more!

Areas

Define boundaries for your spells, environmental effects, or anything your game needs! With custom areas, you can:
  • Create rectangular and radial zones. Define custom areas for your spell arcs, circles, or simple rectangles.
  • Name your areas, communicating exactly what they represent to your players.
  • Recolour areas. Just like tokens, each area can be fully recoloured. Represent your burning red fireballs or your icy blue spells with ease!
  • Copy and paste every area. Don't stress about recreating yet another thorny thicket, just paste another one down.
  • Rotate and resize your areas. You can even alter the arc of a radial area!
    and even more!

Boards

Import custom board textures or use those we provide, and let Dungeon Board do the rest! Dungeon Board provides:
  • Built-in map options so you aren't wasting your time creating the perfect map for your encounter. Including incredible options by Darkest Maps!
  • Custom map textures let you roll your own when you can't find one that perfectly matches your needs!
  • Adjust the grid to flawlessly match your map, allowing pieces to snap exactly.
  • Fine-tuned control over your map, with flexible padding adjustment.
  • Floor materials provide a thematic backing, for when play extends just a bit further than you bargained for!
  • Recolour and refine the shade of your board's grid & fog of war. Drive home just how hot your underworld adventure is with a crimson-red fog!

More Tools

Dungeon Board contains a wide variety of additional tools and features, including:
  • Measure Tool: Quickly measure distances between any two points on your board, using the grid's pre-configured units.
  • Fog Paint Tool: Paint in areas of fog to obscure tokens, allowing you to hide upcoming encounters!
  • Points of Interest: Create markers that can contain images and text - giving you a place to describe important objects or interesting locations.
  • Dice Tool: Stay inside Dungeon Board, and make your rolls right in-place where the whole party can witness the tension!
  • Music Player: Import your own soundtrack! Build an immersive world with your own playlist.
  • Hierarchy View: Get an overview of your board. Never lose track of the objects you have created, by viewing them in one structured list.
